title: Gotham Knights Reviews: A Big Disappointment or Just Okay? -  Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.20.22
description:
Gotham Knights reviews! New Tales From The Borderlands reviews! Silent Hill! There's so much to talk about and Greg and Tim got you covered. Let's talk all of that, plus Bungie's new game and and a new Final Fantasy 16 trailer.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:51 - Housekeeping

A new episode of Xcast is up right now and it’s our review (so far) of Gotham Knights featuring the regular Xcast crew plus the one and only Barrett Courtney. That’s up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

Later today we’re recording our PS I Love You XOXO preview of God of War Ragnarok. Write in with your questions to kindafunny.com/psily and then watch when it goes live for everyone tomorrow on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.

The Roper Report  -

00:08:06 - Gotham Knights Review round up
00:23:10 - New Tales From The Borderlands Review round up
00:26:57 - Konami has made a bunch of Silent Hill announcements!
00:39:38 - Ad
00:41:55 - Final Fantasy 16 got a brand new trailer!
00:46:45 - Is Bungie’s next game a revival of its Marathon Series?
00:51:14 - A developer claims ‘many’ studios are asking Xbox to drop mandatory Series S compatibility
00:56:10 - Out today
00:58:08 - Squad Up: LolLosersDC - Steam - LOLLOSERSDC
00:59:23 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Bless
